name: Ladies Two-Part Night Dress – Comfortable and Stylish Sleepwear
description:
This ladies' night dress offers both comfort and style, making it perfect for a relaxing night’s sleep. The two-piece nighty set is designed with soft, breathable fabric for all-night comfort. The elegant design provides a relaxed fit, ensuring ease of movement. Ideal for lounging or sleeping, this night dress is a must-have addition to your nightwear collection. Suitable for all seasons, it combines style and functionality for a luxurious feel.

Specifications of Ladies Two-Part Night Dress – Comfortable and Stylish Sleepwear

Size- 34, 36, 38, 40, 42
